name: George's Southwestern Chili Con Carne

instructions.en: Brown ground beef, onion, and garlic in a large skillet; drain grease.
instructions.sk: Opečte mleté mäso, cibuľu a cesnak na veľkej panvici; zlejte mastnotu.
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンで挽肉、玉ねぎ、ニンニクを炒めて茶色くし、脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Add peppers and all spices to the skillet.
instructions.sk: Pridajte papriky a všetky koreniny do panvice.
instructions.ja: フライパンにピーマンとすべての香辛料を加えます。

instructions.en: Stir in tomatoes; bring to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte paradajky; priveďte do varu a varte 10 minút.
instructions.ja: トマトを加えて混ぜ、沸騰させて10分間煮込みます。

instructions.en: Stir in cilantro. Serve over chopped lettuce and garnish with shredded cheese and sour cream if desired.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte koriander. Podávajte na nasekanom šaláte a podľa chuti ozdobte strúhaným syrom a kyslou smotanou.
instructions.ja: コリアンダーを混ぜ込みます。刻んだレタスの上に盛り、お好みでシュレッドチーズとサワークリームを添えて提供します。

notes: Makes 6 servings. Can be frozen. Garnishes (cheese and sour cream) are not included in nutritional information.
